item.title: Stephen King Has So Many Great Villains, But These 5 Randall Flagg Moments Prove He's The Best One
item.description: The King of Horror's villains are some of the best in literature overall, but Stephen King's Randall Flagg is by far the best, and I can prove why.

item.title: This Planet Of The Apes Theory Perfectly Explains How The New Movies Connect To The Original Films In One Unified Timeline
item.description: The Planet of the Apes franchise includes ten movies released over the course of decades, yet one theory posits that almost all of them are connected.

item.title: "You Donâ€™t Want to Let Go Of Lightning When It Strikes:" James Gunn Addresses Surprise Popularity Of Groot And Nebula In Guardians Of The Galaxy
item.description: James Gunn was surprised at Groot and Nebula's popularity in the Guardians of the Galaxy films, but he later leaned into the positive fan response.
